captions.text:
I'm gonna
fly you all down here

In the jelly
of the month club.

That keeps on giving
the whole year.

If this isn't the biggest
bag over the head,

Punch in the face
I ever got.

If any of you
are looking

For any last minute
gift ideas for me,

I'd like frank shirley,
my boss, right here tonight.

I want him brought from
his happy holiday slumber

Over there on melody lane
with all the other rich people,

And I want him
brought right here...

With a big ribbon
on his head,

And I want to look him
straight in the eye
And tell him what a cheap,

title: Clark Freaks Out - Christmas Vacation (9/10) Movie CLIP (1989) HD

comments.text: It's a one year subscription to the Big 80s﻿
comments.author: barf245

comments.text: This is how I get when I'm pissed﻿
comments.author: Michelle C

comments.text:
Hey! If any of you are looking for any last-minute gift ideas for me, I 
have one. I'd like Frank Shirley, my boss, right here tonight. I want him 
brought from his happy holiday slumber over there on Melody Lane with all 
the other rich people and I want him brought right here, with a big ribbon 
on his head, and I want to look him straight in the eye and I want to tell 
him what a cheap, lying, no-good, rotten, four-flushing, low-life, 
snake-licking, dirt-eating, inbred, overstuffed, ignorant, blood-sucking, 
dog-kissing, brainless, dickless, hopeless, heartless, fat-ass, bug-eyed, 
stiff-legged, spotty-lipped, worm-headed sack of monkey shit he is! 
Hallelujah! Holy shit! Where's the Tylenol?﻿
comments.author: PR1NCEDARKNESS

comments.text: bloody pimp﻿
comments.author: Acear Bern

comments.text:
This was pretty much my reaction, after selling an item on Ebay for a large 
sum of money, only to find out that not only did the buyer ignore my no 
international shipping terms,  but also ended up backing out without 
canceling the damned order, making Ebay take out the final value percentage 
fee from my bank account, for an unpaid item.  LOL. ﻿
comments.author: Nar Comic Underworld

comments.text:
Your right, I'd at least make a note for yourself to not do business with 
him in the future if you can avoid it.
comments.author: Peter Palmiotti

comments.text:

mostly with buyers rather than sellers. To appeal his bad feedback would 
mean for me to go through another tedious process.
